choose.when: insert into member_tbl(user_id, user_pw, user_name, image) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{image})
choose.otherwise: insert into member_tbl(user_id, user_pw, user_name, image, responsibility) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{image}, 'Admin')
